dcterms:creator: Hendrickx, I., Kim, S. N., Kozareva, Z., Nakov, P., O'Seaghdha, D. A., Padó, S., Pennacchiotti, M., Romano, L., Szpakowicz, S.
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 10,674 sentences annotated with pairs of entities and their relationships, focusing on cause-effect relationships for causal sentence detection.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2010 (Task 8)

dcterms:creator: Mirza, P., Sprugnoli, R., Tonelli, S., Speranza, M.
dcterms:description: A dataset derived from the TimeBank corpus, containing 2,470 sentences with causal relations identified using C-SIGNAL and CLINK tags.
dcterms:title: CausalTB

dcterms:creator: Caselli, T., Vossen, P.
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 4,107 sentences with causal relations identified using PLOT LINK tags for causal sentence detection.
dcterms:title: EventSL

dcterms:creator: Kyriakakis, M., Androutsopoulos, I., Ginés, J., Saudabayev, A.
dcterms:description: A biomedical dataset containing 13,342 sentences, with 7,562 causal sentences, developed for causal sentence detection in biomedical texts. A subset of 2,000 sentences is publicly available.
dcterms:title: BioCausal
